author: hwright
msg: More get_mergeinfo() refactoring.  Move the conversion of mergeinfo to
stringbufs into the wrapper, so that other consumers don't have to parse the
stringbugs to obtain the mergeinfo.
* subversion/libsvn_fs_util/mergeinfo-sqlite-index.c
(get_mergeinfo): Add a brief doc string.  Move the stringbuf conversion from
here...
(svn_fs_mergeinfo__get_mergeinfo): ...to here.
(svn_fs_mergeinfo_get_mergeinfo_for_tree): Don't parse the mergeinfo, because
it is now provided as a hash instead of a string.

author: cmpilato
msg: * tools/dev/graph-dav-servers.py
Use the Python Imaging Library to resize the matplotlib results so
that the image fits in the Tigris.org branding "space".

author: cmpilato
msg: * www/images/svn-dav-securityspace-survey.png
Shrink this to 800 pixels wide so it fits under the Tigris.org
header branding (and fits on a 1024x768 display).

author: blair
msg: * tools/backup/hot-backup.py.in:
Update the description of the script to indicate that it backs up
any Subversion repository, not just those with a Berkeley DB
backend and will also clean up old Berkeley DB log files.
Update the copyright year to 2007 since there was a coding change
done in 2007.

author: hwright
msg: A couple of documentation fixes in followup to r25251.
Suggested by: malcolm
* subversion/svnserve/serve.c
(log_cmd): Remove a confusing and incorrect comment.
* subversion/libsvn_ra_svn/protocol:
(3.1.1): Add a note explaining what to send for an 'unlimited' log limit.
